Package dk.via.sep.shared.networking.userServerRemote

Interface UserServerCallback

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UserServer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServerHandler
    public interface UserServerCallback
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Callback interface for the client to use remotely. All of them are called only by the client, through RMI.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void deleteAccount​(User user)
      Method used to delete a user account from the database.
      void editUserDetails​(User user, java.util.UUID clientID)
      Method used to edit a user's credentials.
      java.util.ArrayList<User> getActiveUsers()
      Method used to get the list of currently active users.
      java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserList()
      Method used to get the list of currently existing users.
      User login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Method used to login in a client into the database.
      void logOut()
      Method used to log out the client from the server.
      boolean registerAccount​(User user)
      Method used to register an account into the database.
      void registerClient​(UserClientCallback client, java.util.UUID clientID)
      Method used to register a client interface to the server, so it can be used to send data back to the client.

    • Method Detail

      • registerAccount

        boolean registerAccount​(User user)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to register an account into the database.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be registered.
        Returns:
        boolean if the user has been successfully registered or not.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the connection cannot be established.

      • login

        User login​(java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password)
    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to login in a client into the database.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user.
        password - the password of the user.
        Returns:
        the user that has the credentials as specified in the parameters. Will be null if there is no such user.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the connection cannot be established.

      • registerClient

        void registerClient​(UserClientCallback client,
                    java.util.UUID clientID)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to register a client interface to the server, so it can be used to send data back to the client. This method is a callback.
        Parameters:
        client - the client callback interface.
        clientID - the client's UUID.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the connection cannot be established.

      • logOut

        void logOut()
     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to log out the client from the server.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the connection cannot be established.

      • getUserList

        java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserList()
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to get the list of currently existing users.
        Returns:
        the list of currently existing users.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the connection cannot be established.

      • getActiveUsers

        java.util.ArrayList<User> getActiveUsers()
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to get the list of currently active users.
        Returns:
        the method does not return anything, as it isn't necessary at the time of writing.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the connection cannot be established.

      • deleteAccount

        void deleteAccount​(User user)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to delete a user account from the database. Warning: this user needs to have an ID, that has been attached to it from the database, otherwise, the DAO will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be deleted.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the connection cannot be established.

      • editUserDetails

        void editUserDetails​(User user,
                     java.util.UUID clientID)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to edit a user's credentials. Warning: the user needs to have the changes applied to it as well, and contain an ID that has been attached to it from the database, otherwise, the DAO will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be edited, along with the new details.
        clientID - the client's UUID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the connection cannot be established.
